tool_description:
‎Cryptocurrency - ‎Coins - Ticker. 
Information for coin exchange prices 
This endpoint result specify :
- Exchange
- Symbol
- Price ( USD,SGD, AUD and more )
- Volume 24Hr
and more

Over 3 Exchange
name: Coin Market
title: Coin Market

api_list.name: data

required_parameters.name: quotesymbol
required_parameters.description: Quote Symbol. Example : USD, SGD, AUD

optional_parameters.name: basesymbol
optional_parameters.description: Inset Symbol for search. Example : BTC, ETH
